original: nye rten 'brel bsdus pa'i sgron ma dang / nyo rdor sems dmigs drug rtsa ba bcas dpe mngon na slar 'dir 'jug /
analyzed: nye rten brel sdud ba sgron ma dang nyo rdar sems dmigs drug rtsa ba cha dpe mngon na slar dir jug

original: sangs rgyas la yid ches skyes tsam na brgyud pa'i byin rlabs 'byung bar nges gong ma la mos pa skyes tsam na thugs rje'i byin rlabs 'byung bar nges bla ma la gdung ba skyes tsam na nyams dang byin rlabs skye bar nges snang srid chos skur shes tsam
analyzed: sangs rgya la yid ches skye tsam na brgyud ba byin rlabs byung ba nges gong ma la mos ba skye tsam na thugs rje byin rlabs byung ba nges bla ma la gdung ba skye tsam na nyams dang byin rlabs skye ba nges snang srid chos skur shes tsam

original: na nyon mongs rang sar grol bar nges ye grol cer bzhag gis rgyas thebs na sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin par nges lus ngag bde ba rnyed tsam na bla ma'i byin rlabs yin par nges 'khrul pa phyi rol gyi snang ba 'gags tsam na rang gi rtsol ba
analyzed: na nyon mongs rang sar grol ba nges ye grol cer jog gis rgya thebs na sangs rgya dgongs ba yin ba nges lus ngag bde ba rnyed tsam na bla ma byin rlabs yin ba nges khrul ba phyi rol gyi snang ba gag tsam na rang gi rtsol ba

original: yin par nges de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor bdag 'khor 'das ru shan phyed pas bde zhes lce btsun gyi mgur ro +thii dza yan+tu
analyzed: yin ba nges de ltar rtogs ba rnal byor bdag khor da ru shan phyed ba bde zhes lce btsun gyi mgur ro +thii dza yan+tu
